attributes.additional_details: I am on the Seetec Work Programme and they are absolutely rubbish and don't work I have got a paid job in the Green Café at Bolton At Home five days a week and also I have become a Volunteer for Meningitis Now and that's not good enough for them I still have to go on. I had no support from them whatsoever and have to do everything myself and always getting the wrong dates on the letters. They also got my money stopped when I told two people that I was going on holiday they said it was fine and we change the date for you. Until I got back and found out that my money stopped. When I do go without being told my advisor wasn't there.
